CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 모든 Unit 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- Unit AI 노드 연결

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local Position = Entity.TransformComponent.Position self.Destination = Vector2(Position.x, Position.y)
-- 행동 틱 0.4초 self.tick = 0.4
local AttackType = Entity.Unit.UnitInfo["AttackType"]
local Root = SequenceNode() local Seq1 = SequenceNode() local Sel1 = SelectorNode()
local UnitTimer = UnitTimer() local UnitMove = UnitMove() local UnitInteraction = UnitInteraction() local UnitAttack = nil local UnitChase = nil
-- 공격 타입에 따라 Normal과 Heal로 나뉨 if AttackType == "Normal" then UnitAttack = UnitNormalAttack() UnitChase = UnitNormalChase() elseif AttackType == "Heal" then UnitAttack = UnitHeal() UnitChase = UnitHealChase() end
Root:AttachChild(Seq1)
Seq1:AttachChild(UnitTimer) Seq1:AttachChild(Sel1)
Sel1:AttachChild(UnitInteraction) Sel1:AttachChild(UnitAttack) Sel1:AttachChild(UnitChase) Sel1:AttachChild(UnitMove)
Entity.AIComponent:SetRootNode(Root)
